items.bio: Gulya is a recognized expert in the field of manicure, depilation and professional facial care with 8 years of experience. With her mastery of aesthetic transformation techniques and attention to detail, she creates flawless images, providing each client with the highest level of care and professional approach.
items.name: Kasymova Gulcehre
items.position: Master of manicure, depilation, facial care

items.bio: Jennifer embodies the talent of a multi-disciplinary specialist. She masterfully performs both basic and complex beauty procedures, providing a comprehensive and harmonious approach to your transformation.
items.name: Peradilla Jennifer

items.bio: Mestan is a unique master who combines the talent of a top stylist and a permanent makeup expert. Her deep knowledge allows you to create complete and flawless images that highlight your individuality.
items.name: Amandurdyyeva Mestan

items.bio: Simo is our salon's leading expert in the field of premium care and complex coloring. His many years of international experience and proprietary techniques guarantee the highest class results.
items.name: Mohamed Sabri

items.bio: Lyazat is a true perfectionist in the nail service industry. With impeccable taste and attention to detail, she creates the perfect manicure and pedicure, taking care of the aesthetics and health of your hands.
items.name: Kozhabay Lyazat
